## PUBLICATION\

We are committed to include camera-ready paper submitted to iCMS2025 in our e-Proceeding book to ensure all authors can benefit from them. \

**Selected papers will be considered for publication in the selected journals as listed below.**\

**Publication Opportunities:**\

1. Austrian Journal of Statistics\ 
2. Romanian Statistical Review \
3. Voice of Academia (VoA)\ 
4. Journal of Applied Mathematics and Computational Intelligence (AMCI)\
5. Journal of Creative Practices in Language Learning and Teaching (CPLT)\

Selected authors will be invited to prepare an extended version of their paper (more than 30% changes), which will be published after editorial board & evaluators approval and additional cost may apply.\

Author will need to follow the template provided by the selected journal.\


 **- Voice of Academia (VoA)**\


**- Journal of Applied Mathematics and**\
**Computational Intelligence (AMCI)**\


**- Journal of Creative Practices in Language **\
**Learning and Teaching (CPLT)**\
